Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting its quality and craftsmanship. Considering its worth to us, we propose a price of $12,000 for it. We believe this offers a fair balance between the value we place on the product and what you perceive its worth to be. Should you choose to accept this offer, we guarantee a seamless transaction and delivery. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
